channel.title: Problem With This Coding, [PI]

item.title: Problem With This Coding, [PI]
item.dc:creator: @yo_dude_1345 yo dude 1345
item.description:
@yo_dude_1345 wrote:

ok So i made a timer based on character tokens,
clana is the timer
clanb the character token that is given to start the timer
clana -= 1; is so it subtracts one second off the time
the }else { is for if the timer “clana” == 5 then they get teleported with this “getPA().movePlayer(3211, 3420, 0);”
then after the teleportation it changes bolt character tokens back to “0” “clanb = 0” “clana = 0”

Read full topic

item.title: Problem With This Coding, [PI]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“yo dude 1345, post:1, topic:407121”]Ok so I made a timer and it works and all but when that timer reaches “0” it teleports you to specific X and Y coords. Now The Problem is, is that when you get teleported to those X and Y coords you cannot move, and if you try to teleport it teleports you back to those specific coords. So here is the code that I came up with…

clana is the timer and clanb is the character token that gets reset.

[code] if (clana > 0) {
clanb = 1;

	clana -= 1;
             } else {
             clana = 5;

getPA().movePlayer(3211, 3420, 0);
clanb = 0;
clana = 0;

	}

[/code][/quote]
That code makes no sense whatsoever.

  1. your checking if they have more then 0 points (clana) then wtf is the clanb = 1; for if you have clana -=1;?
  2. Is this what you mean?

if (clana > 0) { clana -= 1; } else { if (clana = 5) { getPA().movePlayer(3211, 3420, 0); clanb = 0; clana = 0; } } }

Read full topic

@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Im not good with Pi servers but um, try putting a else if statement in front (or above) the getPA() .movePlayer

item.title: Problem With This Coding, [PI]
item.dc:creator: @yo_dude_1345 yo dude 1345
item.description:
@yo_dude_1345 wrote:

Ok so I made a timer and it works and all but when that timer reaches “0” it teleports you to specific X and Y coords. Now The Problem is, is that when you get teleported to those X and Y coords you cannot move, and if you try to teleport it teleports you back to those specific coords. So here is the code that I came up with…

clana is the timer and clanb is the character token that gets reset.

[code] if (clana > 0) {
clanb = 1;

	clana -= 1;
             } else {
             clana = 5;

getPA().movePlayer(3211, 3420, 0);
clanb = 0;
clana = 0;

	}

[/code]

Read full topic
